name: The Procter & Gamble Company
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (P&G) is a leading American multinational corporation specializing in a broad range of branded consumer packaged goods, including personal care, health, hygiene, and household products. Headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, P&G operates globally with iconic brands such as Tide, Pampers, Gillette, and Olay, and is consistently ranked among the world’s largest consumer goods companies.
